title: How to remove the screenshot/select option from the slow up swipe and revert back to the recent apps
content: Since the recent update to 11, the slow up swipe has changed to giving the option of screenshot/select which useless. The previous arrangement of being able to quick flick between recent apps was alot better. Any way of changing this back to the way it was? Or how do you downgrade?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4
